Module SC2002
Package fsmjdoc

Class Branch

java.lang.Object
fsmjdoc.Branch
public class Branch extends Object
The Branch class represents a branch of a restaurant or retail location. It manages a list of menu items and orders associated with the branch.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Branch(String branchName)
    Constructs a new Branch with the specified name.

      public fsmjdoc.Order.OrderStatus getOrderStatus(int orderId)
      Retrieves the status of an order with the specified ID.
      Parameters:
      orderId - The ID of the order.
      Returns:
      The status of the order, or OrderStatus.NOTEXISTING if the order is not found.
